text: Andrea Fernanda "Ea" Tovar de la Peña (born 22 August 1990) is a Venezuelan footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Spanish club Deportivo Alavés Gloriosas and the Venezuela women's national team. She formerly played in the domestic Venezuelan women's football championship with Caracas FC and Deportivo La Guaira, in the domestic Campeonato Brasileiro de Futebol Feminino with São José Esporte Clube in Brazil and in the domestic Colombian Women's Football League with Alianza Petrolera FC in Colombia. ==Awards== *Venezuelan Women's Cup 2008-09 15px *Venezuelan Women's Cup 2009-10 15px *Venezuelan Women's Cup 2010-11 15px *Venezuelan Women's Cup 2011-12 15px ==References== * Andrea Tovar es el muro de la portería roja * Andrea Tovar deja al Caracas FC para incursionar en el fútbol brasileño * Andrea Tovar lleva sus guantes a brasil *Plantilla Alavés Gloriosas ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Caracas Category:Venezuelan women's footballers Category:Women's association football goalkeepers Category:São José Esporte Clube (women) players Category:Venezuela women's international footballers Category:Venezuelan expatriate women's footballers Category:Venezuelan expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Brazil Category:Venezuelan expatriate sportspeople in Colombia Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Colombia Category:Venezuelan expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Spain
title: Andrea Fernanda Tovar
